property.name: Service
property.propertyComment: /** Gets the service type that is controlled by the binding. */

property.name: Target
property.propertyComment: /** Gets or sets the type of target for the binding. */

property.name: IsConditional
property.propertyComment: /** Gets a value indicating whether the binding has a condition associated with it. */

property.name: Condition
property.propertyComment: /** Gets or sets the condition defined for the binding. */

property.name: ProviderType
property.propertyComment: /** Gets or sets the type that returns the provider that should be used by the binding. */

property.name: Scope
property.propertyComment: /** Gets or sets the callback that returns the object that will act as the binding's scope. */

property.name: Arguments
property.propertyComment: /** Gets the parameters defined for the binding. */

property.name: Name
property.propertyComment: /** Gets or sets the optional name defined for the binding. */
